channel.title: Comments for page "Eleven Tails"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Eleven Tails"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Extra favor per week, not every seventh day. It stays with you the entire week and refreshes back to 1 each week Sunday regardless of if you used it or not

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
"One Free Storm Favor per week (refeshes on Sunday, does not count towards daily max)"

day 1 : you get the free storm favor.
day 8 : you get the free storm favor.

You can use that favor only on the day you get it or anytime between days 1-7?
